name: Vorpal Sword
flavour: The blade hums with an eager, almost hungry resonance. Its edge exists in a state of impossible sharpness.
description:
You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls. Ignores resistance to slashing damage.

**Vorpal Strike**: On a natural 20, cut off one head. Creature dies if it can't survive without the head.

**Severing Edge**: Critical hits deal an extra 6d8 slashing damage.

name: Holy Avenger
flavour: The blade radiates warmth that speaks of dawn breaking over ancient battlefields.
description:
You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls. Extra 2d10 radiant damage vs fiends/undead.

**Aura of Protection**: 10ft radius, allies have advantage on saves vs spells and magic.

name: Staff of Power
flavour: Crystalline veins pulse with arcane energy along the staff's length.
description:
Grants +2 to AC, saves, and spell attacks. 20 charges for spells including fireball, lightning bolt, wall of force.

**Retributive Strike**: Break the staff to release magic in an explosion.

name: Cloak of Invisibility
flavour: The fabric seems woven from twilight itself—neither fully present nor absent.
description: Pull hood up to become invisible for up to 2 hours total. Regains 1 hour per 12 hours unused.

name: Oathbow
flavour: Carved from heartwood of a tree that witnessed an ancient betrayal. It hungers to see vows fulfilled.
description: Speak command to mark a sworn enemy for 7 days. Advantage on attacks, ignore cover, +3d6 damage vs sworn enemy. Disadvantage vs all others.

name: Bow of Warning
flavour: The bowstring hums with constant vigilance that seeps into your bones.
description: +2 to attack and damage. Advantage on initiative. You and companions within 30ft can't be surprised. Awakens sleepers when combat begins.

name: Sun Blade
flavour: A blade of pure sunlight springs forth from the hilt. Undead recoil from its brilliance.
description: +2 to attack and damage. Deals radiant damage. Emits 15ft sunlight. Extra 1d8 radiant vs undead.

name: Luck Blade
flavour: Fortune favours those who carry this blade. Fate itself bends in your favour.
description: +1 to attack, damage, and saves. Once per dawn, reroll any attack, check, or save. Has 1d4-1 Wish charges.

name: Robe of the Archmagi
properties: Wondrous item (requires attunement by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard)
flavour: Woven from threads of pure magic, shimmering with arcane symbols.
description: AC 15 + Dex (no armor). Advantage on saves vs spells/magic. +2 to spell save DC and spell attack.

name: Dancing Sword
flavour: Release the blade and it fights on its own, spinning and slashing through the air.
description: Bonus action to release. Hovers up to 30ft, attacks one creature within 5ft using your stats. Attacks 4 times then returns.

name: Belt of Fire Giant Strength
flavour: Forged in volcanic fire. Feel the unstoppable strength of the fire giants.
description: Your Strength score becomes 25.

name: Cloak of Arachnida
flavour: Spun from phase spider silk. Walls become floors, webs become pathways.
description: Climb speed equal to walk speed (including ceilings). Move through webs freely. Can't be caught in webs. Resistance to poison.

name: Longbow +2
flavour: Masterfully crafted with enchanted limbs that add power to every shot.
description: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

name: Longbow +1
flavour: A well-balanced bow with minor enchantments.
description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

name: Swiftshot Shortbow
flavour: A compact bow that seems to nock arrows of its own accord.
description: +1 to attack and damage. Once per turn when you hit, you can immediately make another attack as part of the same action.

name: Arrows of Humanoid Slaying (5)
flavour: Black-fletched arrows that seek the hearts of men.
description: If a humanoid takes damage from one of these arrows, it must make a DC 17 Constitution save or take an extra 6d10 piercing damage.

name: Quiver of Ehlonna
flavour: This quiver has three compartments that seem impossibly deep.
description: Holds 60 arrows, 18 javelins, and 6 long items like bows. Retrieving items is easy.

name: Bracers of Archery
flavour: Leather bracers etched with images of arrows in flight.
description: You gain proficiency with longbows and shortbows, and +2 bonus to damage rolls on ranged attacks with such weapons.

name: Cloak of Elvenkind
flavour: Woven from spider silk and shadow, this cloak shifts colours to match surroundings.
description: With hood up, Perception checks to see you have disadvantage, and you have advantage on Stealth checks to hide.

name: Boots of Elvenkind
flavour: Soft leather boots that absorb sound.
description: Your steps make no sound. Advantage on Stealth checks that rely on moving silently.

name: Eyes of the Eagle
flavour: Crystal lenses that pull distant objects closer to the eye.
description: Advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight. See details of distant objects up to 2 feet across.

name: Venom Fang
flavour: A wicked blade with channels that weep deadly green ichor.
description: +1 to attack and damage. On hit, extra 2d10 poison damage. Can be recoated during short rest.

name: Rapier +2
flavour: An elegant weapon, perfectly balanced for precise strikes.
description: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

name: Shortsword +1
flavour: A well-made blade with minor enchantments.
description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

name: Daggers of Returning (Pair)
flavour: Twin blades forged from the same ore, forever drawn back to each other.
description: +1 to attack and damage. Returns to your hand immediately after thrown.

name: Gloves of Thievery
flavour: Thin as a second skin, these gloves enhance dexterity while leaving no fingerprints.
description: Invisible while worn. +5 bonus to Sleight of Hand checks and lockpicking.

name: Hat of Disguise
flavour: A fashionable hat that shifts and changes to suit any disguise.
description: Cast disguise self at will while wearing. Spell ends if hat is removed.

name: Masterwork Thieves' Tools
flavour: Picks, files, and probes made from the finest materials.
description: +2 bonus to checks to pick locks or disarm traps.

name: Cloak of Displacement
flavour: Projects an illusion making you appear slightly away from your actual position.
description: Creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against you. Resets at start of your turn if you take damage.

name: Longsword +2
flavour: A masterfully forged blade that seems to guide itself toward enemies.
description: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

name: Longsword +1
flavour: A reliable blade with minor enchantments.
description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

name: Greatsword +2
flavour: A massive blade that cleaves through armor like parchment.
description: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

name: Battleaxe +2
flavour: Runes of battle are carved into the axe head.
description: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

name: Flame Tongue Longsword
flavour: The steel carries an inner fire that never dies—even sheathed, the blade is warm.
description: Bonus action to ignite. While ablaze, deals extra 2d6 fire damage and sheds 40ft bright light.

name: Frost Brand Longsword
flavour: Ice crystals form along the blade's edge. The air grows cold when drawn.
description: Deals extra 1d6 cold damage. Fire resistance while held. In freezing temps, sheds 10ft bright light.

name: Shield +2
flavour: A sturdy shield reinforced with protective enchantments.
description: While holding this shield, you have a +2 bonus to AC in addition to the shield's normal AC bonus.

name: Shield +1
flavour: A well-made shield with minor protective enchantments.
description: While holding this shield, you have a +1 bonus to AC in addition to the shield's normal AC bonus.

name: Sentinel Shield
flavour: An eye is emblazoned on the shield's face, always alert for danger.
description: Advantage on initiative rolls and Perception checks.

name: Plate Armor +1
flavour: Masterwork plate armor with magical reinforcement.
description: AC 18 + 1 bonus. Requires Strength 15.

name: Half Plate +1
flavour: Reinforced half plate with enchanted joints.
description: AC 15 + Dex (max 2) + 1 bonus.

name: Chain Mail +1
flavour: Expertly forged links that turn aside blows.
description: AC 16 + 1 bonus. Requires Strength 13.

name: Gauntlets of Ogre Power
flavour: Heavy iron gauntlets that pulse with bestial strength.
description: Your Strength score becomes 19.

name: Boots of Speed
flavour: Winged designs on the heels glow when activated.
description: Bonus action to double walking speed for 10 minutes. 1/long rest.

name: Studded Leather +1
flavour: Supple leather enchanted to turn aside weapons.
description: AC 12 + Dex + 1 bonus. No stealth penalty.

name: Bracers of Defense
flavour: Etched with protective runes that shimmer with defensive magic.
description: +2 bonus to AC if wearing no armor and using no shield.

name: Ring of Protection
flavour: Silver bands interweave in an endless knot, shifting when danger approaches.
description: +1 bonus to AC and saving throws.

name: Amulet of Health
flavour: A deep red gem pulses with a rhythm that steadies your heartbeat.
description: Your Constitution score becomes 19.

name: Potion of Greater Healing
flavour: A swirling red liquid that glows from within.
description: Regain 4d4 + 4 hit points.

name: Potion of Superior Healing
flavour: A brilliant crimson potion that pulses with healing magic.
description: Regain 8d4 + 8 hit points.

name: Potion of Invisibility
flavour: This potion's container looks empty but feels full.
description: Invisible for 1 hour. Ends early if you attack or cast a spell.

name: Potion of Water Breathing
flavour: Cloudy green fluid that smells of the sea.
description: Breathe underwater for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Climbing
flavour: Brown, muddy liquid that smells of moss.
description: Climbing speed equal to walking speed for 1 hour. Advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to climb.

name: Bag of Holding
flavour: Interior is much larger than outside dimensions.
description: Holds 500 lbs / 64 cu ft. Always weighs 15 lbs.

name: Sending Stones
flavour: Smooth stones with matching runes that pulse when a message is sent.
description: Cast sending 1/day. Works across any distance on same plane.

name: Lantern of Revealing
flavour: The flame burns with an otherworldly blue light.
description: 30ft bright light, 30ft dim. Invisible creatures are visible in bright light.

name: Rope of Climbing
flavour: Silk rope that responds to whispered commands.
description: 60ft rope, holds 3000 lbs. Command word animates it to fasten/unfasten.

name: Medallion of Thoughts
flavour: A silver medallion inscribed with a stylized eye.
description: 3 charges. Cast detect thoughts (DC 13). Regains 1d3 charges at dawn.

name: Ring of Mind Shielding
flavour: A plain silver band that grows warm when mental intrusion is attempted.
description: Immune to magic that reads thoughts, detects lies, or knows alignment/type.

name: Dimensional Shackles
flavour: Heavy iron shackles with runes that glow when securing a creature.
description: Place on incapacitated creature. Prevents teleportation and extradimensional travel. Size Small to Large.

name: Net of Snaring
flavour: Enchanted fibers that tighten when struggling.
description: +2 to attack. Restrained creature has disadvantage on escape (DC 15 Strength).

name: Mithral Manacles
flavour: Lightweight but incredibly strong manacles.
description: DC 25 to break, DC 20 to escape. Weighs only 1 lb.

name: Everburning Torch
flavour: A torch enchanted with continual flame.
description: 20ft bright light, 20ft dim. Never burns out, no heat.

name: Wayfinder's Compass
flavour: A brass compass whose needle always points true.
description: Points to nearest settlement (100+ people) or named location you've visited.

stats.Function: Points to settlements or named locations

name: Enhanced Spyglass
flavour: Brass spyglass with enchanted lenses.
description: 2x magnification, see clearly up to 1 mile.

name: Whistle of Warning
flavour: Silver whistle with selective sound.
description: Sound only heard by up to 6 designated creatures within 1 mile.

name: Sailor's Charm
flavour: Anchor pendant carved from driftwood.
description: Hold breath 2x longer. Advantage on swimming checks.

name: Investigator's Lens
flavour: Magnifying glass that reveals hidden details.
description: Advantage on Investigation checks to find hidden details, secret compartments, or forgeries. Reads invisible ink.

name: Diplomat's Pouch
flavour: Leather case that protects contents from all harm.
description: Documents inside protected from water, fire, damage. Hidden compartment (DC 20 to find).

name: Bounty Hunter's Brand
flavour: An iron brand that marks your quarry.
description: Action to mark creature for 24 hours. Know direction and distance while on same plane. 1/long rest.

name: Grappling Hook of Sure Grip
flavour: Enchanted hook that bites deep into any surface.
description: Advantage to secure. Holds up to 1,000 lbs.

name: Persistent Caltrops
flavour: Caltrops that phase slightly, hard to spot.
description: DC 18 Perception to notice. Standard caltrop effects (stop movement, 1 piercing damage).

name: Smoke Pellets (5)
flavour: Small pellets that burst into obscuring smoke.
description: Throw as action. 10ft radius heavily obscured for 1 minute or until dispersed.

name: Trident of the Waves
flavour: Barnacles cling to the shaft, and the tines gleam with an oceanic blue sheen.
description: +2 to attack and damage. Can breathe underwater while holding. Thrown attacks underwater have no penalty.

name: Cloak of the Manta Ray
flavour: The dark fabric flows like water and sprouts fins when submerged.
description: Breathe underwater and swim speed of 60 feet while wearing hood up in water.

name: Returning Harpoon
flavour: A rope of solidified seawater connects the harpoon to your grip.
description: +1 to attack and damage. Returns to hand after thrown. Can grapple Large or smaller creatures on hit (escape DC 14).

name: Gauntlets of Forgefire
flavour: Veins of molten metal run through these gauntlets, warm to the touch.
description: Resistance to fire damage. Unarmed strikes deal +1d6 fire damage. Can heat metal objects by touching them.

name: Emberward Shield
flavour: Forged in Molten forges, this shield absorbs heat like a sponge.
description: +2 AC. When hit by fire damage, reduce by 1d6 (minimum 0).

name: Arrows of Fire (10)
flavour: The arrowheads glow with barely contained flame.
description: On hit, deal extra 1d6 fire damage and target must succeed DC 12 Dex save or catch fire (1d6 fire/turn).

name: Ring of Eloquence
flavour: A silver tongue for those who wear silver.
description: Speak, read, and understand 4 additional languages. +2 bonus to Persuasion checks.

name: Quill of Binding Contracts
flavour: Contracts signed with this quill carry a subtle compulsion.
description: Creatures who sign a contract with this quill have disadvantage on saves against zone of truth for 1 week regarding that contract.

name: Medallion of Safe Passage
flavour: Bearing the Bacca clan seal, this medallion grants respect on trade roads.
description: Advantage on Charisma checks with merchants and toll collectors. +2 to initiative when ambushed on roads.

name: Boots of the Longstrider
flavour: Well-worn boots that never seem to tire the wearer.
description: Walking speed increases by 10 feet. Ignore difficult terrain from undergrowth or rough roads.

name: Charm of the Sure Wheel
flavour: A small wheel charm blessed by Farmer priests.
description: Attach to a vehicle. Vehicle cannot have its wheels broken or axle damaged except by magical means.

name: Horn of Rally
flavour: A brass horn used by caravan guards across the Western Province.
description: When blown, allies within 300ft know your exact location and can't be frightened for 1 minute. 1/day.

name: Cloak of Northern Furs
flavour: Thick furs from the northern beasts, warm in any weather.
description: Automatically succeed on saves against extreme cold. Advantage on Survival checks in cold climates.

name: Icebreaker Battleaxe
flavour: Forged in the coldest Blackstone mines, this axe radiates bitter chill.
description: +1 to attack and damage. Deals extra 1d6 cold damage. Critical hits reduce target speed by 10ft until end of their turn.

name: Blackstone War Paint
flavour: Dark paint made from crusite minerals, used by Blackstone warriors before battle.
description: Apply as action. For 1 hour: +1 to Intimidation, enemies have disadvantage on opportunity attacks against you.

name: Banner of Parley
flavour: A white banner recognized across all clan territories as a sign of peaceful intent.
description: While carrying this banner visibly, clan warriors will not attack first without provocation. Grants advantage on Persuasion checks when negotiating between clans.

name: Seal of the Witness
flavour: An official seal that marks the bearer as a neutral witness to agreements.
description: Documents sealed with this become magically binding - any who break the agreement glow faintly for 24 hours. Grants +2 to Insight checks to detect lies during negotiations.

name: Torc of Standing
flavour: A twisted metal torc worn by those with honour among the clans.
description: While worn, you are treated as having +1 higher honour with all clans for the purposes of access and pricing. Cannot be worn by those with -3 or lower honour with any clan.

name: Incense of Truth
flavour: Temple-blessed incense that encourages honesty.
description: When burned, creatures within 10 feet have disadvantage on Deception checks for 10 minutes. Commonly used in temple arbitrations.

name: Blessed Holy Water (3 vials)
flavour: Water blessed by temple priests, potent against the unholy.
description: As an action, splash on a creature within 5 feet or throw up to 20 feet. Fiends and undead take 2d6 radiant damage.

name: Slippers of Spider Climbing
flavour: Soft-soled slippers that grip any surface.
description: Climb difficult surfaces including ceilings without needing to make ability checks. Cannot use if encumbered.

name: Cloak of Many Fashions
flavour: This cloak shifts its appearance to match any occasion.
description: As a bonus action, change the style, color, and apparent quality of the cloak. Useful for blending in at any social level.

name: Dust of Disappearance
flavour: Fine grey powder that bends light around whatever it coats.
description: Throw in the air to coat creatures within 10 feet. They become invisible for 2d4 minutes. Attacking or casting ends it for that creature.

name: Potion of Heroism
flavour: A golden liquid that fills you with courage and vitality.
description: For 1 hour, gain 10 temporary hit points and are under the effect of the bless spell (no concentration required).

name: Rope of Entanglement
flavour: This rope writhes like a living snake, eager to bind.
description: As an action, command it to entangle a creature within 20 feet. Target must succeed DC 15 Dex save or be restrained. Escape DC 15 Str/Acrobatics.

name: Seeker's Wanted Poster
flavour: A magical poster that updates with the target's last known location.
description: When you have a bounty target's name, the poster shows their face and a compass pointing toward them when within 1 mile. Updates every hour.

name: Tangling Bolas
flavour: Weighted cords that magically tighten around their target.
description: On hit, target must succeed DC 13 Str save or be restrained until freed (DC 13 Str check). Returns to your hand at start of your next turn.
